name: Groove Catcher
description: Groove Catcher is the rhythm game that brings flow, groove and art. From chill and meditative to heart-pounding workouts, Groove Catcher delivers. You got your own groove to share? Great! Make some levels in our super-easy, in-game level builder, and share them online with the world on our dedicated site. We love all kinds of music so have a range of styles in the game, and it's simple to load your own for making levels.
